item.title: I need a good run.bat code for soruce plz give
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

may i ask whats happening[quote=“kickyamom50, post:3, topic:352509”][quote]@echo off
color 09
tskill java /a
title Server
“c:/program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java” -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause[/quote][/quote]

you might want to edite that not everyone has 86 bit
